overview: 7 year-old Mengmeng lives in a motel on the fringes of a dried up lake with her mother Ansong, the motel’s manager. One day, Mengmeng accidentally digs up something she shouldn’t have: a rotting carcass, covered in maggots. That night, Mengmeng and her mother are visited by a mysterious stranger and a death-rattle wind.
title: Carrion
